```{r setup}
library(pimbayes)
```


```{r eval = F}
setup(installJulia = TRUE)
```

```{r eval = F}
setup(installJulia = FALSE)
```

```{r eval = F}
# specify julia_path
setup(installJulia = FALSE, JULIA_HOME = julia_path)
```
